properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.ip
properties.description: The ip to register, needn't set it if the autodetect ip works well.

properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.port
properties.description: The port to register, needn't set it if the autodetect port works well.

properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.secure
properties.description: Whether the service is a https service.

properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.request-max-retry
properties.description: Number of max retries when the request fails.

properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.service-pull-threads
properties.description: Number of threads processing the pull service.

properties.name: spring.cloud.finders.discovery.heartbeat-threads
properties.description: Number of threads processing the heartbeat.
